# dplyrbench

```{r, eval = FALSE}
dplyrbench::setup_libs()
```

```{r}
library(dplyrbench)

# non hybrid
benchs({
    mean_ <- function(...) mean(...)
    df <- tibble(x = rnorm(1e6), g = rep(1:1e5, 10)) %>% group_by(g)
  }, 
  summarise(df, x = mean_(x))
)

# hybrid
benchs(
  df <- tibble(x = rnorm(1e6), g = rep(1:1e5, 10)) %>% group_by(g),
  summarise(df, x = mean(x))
)
# partial hybrid
benchs(
  df <- tibble(x = rnorm(1e6), g = rep(1:1e5, 10)) %>% group_by(g),
  summarise(df, x = sum(x) / n())
)

```
